about_the_game:
PLAY SOLO OR CO-OP

Dive into the immersive roguelite RPG experience of Halls of Greed where every decision shapes your fame and fortune. Halls of Greed delivers a thrilling blend of intense PvPvE combat, the hunt for rare loot, and strategic extraction mechanics that will keep you coming back for “just one more round.”

UNIQUE CHARACTER CLASSES

Create and upgrade characters from a diverse selection of classic fantasy archetypes, each with unique abilities and playstyles. Will you embrace the devastating spells of the mage, the discipline of the knight, the precision of the ranger, or the ferocity of the stormwarden? Each class offers a distinct approach to how you dominate the battlefield, and can be specialized to further suit your style through the Class Mastery system.

COLLECT EPIC LOOT

The true measure of success lies in your ability to collect rare and powerful loot scattered throughout the crypts, castle ruins, and dungeons. Uncover legendary weapons, enchanted artifacts, and valuable resources that will enhance your abilities and secure your dominance on the battlefield.

SURVIVE AND EXTRACT

Be sure to extract through one of the magical portals using a keystone and return to camp where you can improve your character, level up your loadout, and give yourself key advantages for the next run!

PERMADEATH

In the high-stakes world of Halls of Greed, death is permanent - when characters die, they joins the ghosts of fallen adventurers vanquished throughout Eldoria, and leave behind the legacy of their deeds.

EXPLORE THE WORLD OF ELDORIA

Halls of Greed invites you to embark on an epic adventure where danger lurks around every corner and fortune favors the bold. Are you ready to embark on an adventure and claim your place among the legends of Eldoria?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Quad-Core Processor (Intel Core i3-8100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200 equivalent or better)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel UHD Graphics 630 or AMD Radeon Vega 8 equivalent)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Six-Core Processor (Intel Core i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 equivalent or better)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card (NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB equivalent or better)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Halls of Greed is a roguelite RPG combining innovative PvPvE combat with thrilling battle-royale extraction gameplay. Engage in strategic battles, collect epic loot, and escape through a portal to secure your treasure!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
